quote: I believe this is the best time in 10 years to be a buyer in the real estate market.
why_clipworthy: Challenges the prevailing narrative of a seller's market, sparking interest and debate.
suggested_hook: Is now really the best time to buy a home? Here's a perspective that might surprise you.

quote: You have to stop giving your buyers or sellers one number and start giving them a range.
why_clipworthy: Provides a specific, actionable tactic for real estate agents to improve pricing strategies.
suggested_hook: Want to improve your property pricing strategy? Here's a simple yet powerful tip.
